name: Clay Ashworth
body:
##Future Educator
My goal is to prepare today's kids for tomorrow.

##About
I currently teach at Higley High School as a battery tech and cymbal tech. I have been with this program for 6 years now. 4 of those years I was part of the marching band and lead the drumline as section leader.

##Education
I am a 3rd year Music Education Major specializing in percussion. I am currently seeking a Bachelors in Music Education and plan on getting a Masters in Composition.

##Portfoilio
[HIPE Winter Drumline](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHJ809JigQg)
[Higley Drumline Cadence](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X6sUUrxocUY)
